org.apache.river.api.io

Annotation Type Serializer


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface Serializer
    Used to annotate a class that contains a readResolve method with the return type. Unfortunately readResolve methods don't support covariant return types, hence this annotation.
    Author:
    peter

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      Class replaceObType 

    • Element Detail

      • replaceObType

        public abstract Class replaceObType
